dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 5019 EH: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 1335 Jefferson Road in Rochester, New York, as the “Specialist Theodore Matthew Glende Post Office”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 1335 Jefferson Road in Rochester, New York, as the Specialist Theodore Matthew Glende Post Office.

section.header: Specialist Theodore Matthew Glende Post Office

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 1335 Jefferson Road in Rochester, New York, shall be known and designated as the Specialist Theodore Matthew Glende Post Office.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Specialist Theodore Matthew Glende Post Office.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives September 8, 2014.
